1.content: Tom was not a great student. Which wasn't to say he was stupid, but rather just did not pay attention very often in his classes, and when he did he would often just disrupt the lecture. When Tom went to his classes today, he expected nothing to be different. Tom wasn't a bad looking guy, he was 6'4", in relatively decent shape, had messy looking brown hair and an above average face, but his lack of seriousness was a huge turn off to most girls. Tom walked into his 9 am lecture, sat in the very back of the large hall, and expected to joke around and cause some problems for his professor. Just another day. Or so he thought.
